input.sentences: the vehicles were lined up to marvel at .
the jumping action on this vehicle was impressive !
the van was designed and detailed to perfection .
the nice old school cars rocked !
the engine was as pretty as the exterior of the car !
output.sentences: On Saturday morning people walked along the street marveling at the cars that were lined up
They were even cars that can jump which was very impressive
There was a van with a really great detailing on it
And also a lot of really old school cars that looked fantastic
So many of the cars had pretty exteriors and interiors and engines
